results.content: Really enjoyed the entire learning process. Very systematic and laid down simply and easy to understand. Would definitely take up another advanced course by Samira :) Thank you for teaching this beautiful art!

response.content: thanks so much, and you are very welcome!!
response.content_html: thanks so much, and you are very welcome!!

results.content_html: Really enjoyed the entire learning process. Very systematic and laid down simply and easy to understand. Would definitely take up another advanced course by Samira :) Thank you for teaching this beautiful art!

results.content: Alhamdullilah,  Samira is an amazing teacher. I have learned so much from doing this course and I would recommend it to anyone who has the desire and determination to learn. The downloadable pdfs are an excellent resource to keep for life and when my wifi was playing up I was able to access my pdfs which I had printed. What's more, is that I got my 2 daughters involved, the youngest being 13 and it has been a wonderful way of spending good quality time with each other whilst learning this art.  This course was really good value for money.

response.content: Thanks for taking the time to write this Faiza, really appreciate it and so glad it's been of value to you!! And it there is anything I can change or improve to make that 4.5 stars in to 5 stars...do let me know!

results.content: Thank you so much Samira for the wonderful course, with step-by-step and clear guidance to follow. This course is so inspiring. Loving also the historical info about the pattern. Jazakillah kahyran :)

results.content: As a total beginner i found the speed too fast and not clear instructions :(

response.content:
sorry to hear this, may i suggest that you try slowing down the playback speed (press the 3 little dots on the bottom right, chose playback speed then  x0.5 or x0.25), also down load the PDF step by step guide so you cans see each step individually

Hope you persevere!

Good luck

Samira
